makeReports.forms.assessment_forms module¶

class makeReports.forms.assessment_forms.CreateNewAssessment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.forms.forms.Form

Form to create new assessment

Form fields:

  • slo: SLO (ModelChoiceField)

  • title: Title (CharField)

  • description: Describe How Measure Aligns with SLO (CharField)

  • domain: Domain (MultipleChoiceField)

  • directMeasure: Direct measure (ChoiceField)

  • finalTerm: Point in Program Assessment is Administered (ChoiceField)

  • where: Where does the assessment occur (CharField)

  • allStudents: Population Measured (ChoiceField)

  • sampleDescription: Describe what students are sampled (if not all) (CharField)

  • frequencyChoice: Frequency of Data Collection (ChoiceField)

  • frequency: Describe frequency if other (CharField)

  • threshold: Proficiency Threshold (CharField)

  • target: Program Proficiency Target: % of students that achieve the proficiency threshold (IntegerField)

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Initializes form, including setting SLO options to passed QuerySet

Keyword Arguments

sloQS (QuerySet) – SLOs to be picked from (generally those within report)

clean_description()¶

Cleans out malicious or excess (from copying/pasting from Word) meta-data from rich text of the description

Returns

cleaned rich text

Return type

str

clean_frequency()¶

Cleans out malicious or excess (from copying/pasting from Word) meta-data from rich text of the frequency

Returns

cleaned rich text

Return type

str

clean_sampleDescription()¶

Cleans out malicious or excess (from copying/pasting from Word) meta-data from rich text of the sample description

Returns

cleaned rich text

Return type

str

clean_where()¶

Cleans out malicious or excess (from copying/pasting from Word) meta-data from rich text of the where field

Returns

cleaned rich text

Return type

str

Bases: makeReports.forms.assessment_forms.EditNewAssessmentForm

Edit imported assessment form (cannot change title, domain, or direct measure)

Form fields:

  • slo: SLO (ModelChoiceField)

  • description: Describe How Measure Aligns with SLO (CharField)

  • finalTerm: Point in Program Assessment is Administered (ChoiceField)

  • where: Where does the assessment occur (CharField)

  • allStudents: Population Measured (ChoiceField)

  • sampleDescription: Describe what students are sampled (if not all) (CharField)

  • frequencyChoice: Frequency of Data Collection (ChoiceField)

  • frequency: Describe frequency if other (CharField)

  • threshold: Proficiency Threshold (CharField)

  • target: Program Proficiency Target: % of students that achieve the proficiency threshold (IntegerField)

class makeReports.forms.assessment_forms.EditNewAssessmentForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: makeReports.forms.assessment_forms.CreateNewAssessment

Form to edit new assessment (no restrictions)

Form fields:

  • slo: SLO (ModelChoiceField)

  • title: Title (CharField)

  • description: Describe How Measure Aligns with SLO (CharField)

  • domain: Domain (MultipleChoiceField)

  • directMeasure: Direct measure (ChoiceField)

  • finalTerm: Point in Program Assessment is Administered (ChoiceField)

  • where: Where does the assessment occur (CharField)

  • allStudents: Population Measured (ChoiceField)

  • sampleDescription: Describe what students are sampled (if not all) (CharField)

  • frequencyChoice: Frequency of Data Collection (ChoiceField)

  • frequency: Describe frequency if other (CharField)

  • threshold: Proficiency Threshold (CharField)

  • target: Program Proficiency Target: % of students that achieve the proficiency threshold (IntegerField)

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Sets SLOs choices to passed set

Keyword Arguments

sloQS (QuerySet) – set of SLOs to choose from

makeReports.forms.cleaners module¶

class makeReports.forms.cleaners.CleanSummer¶

Bases: object

Assumes the plugin Summernote is being used as a widget for a field called text, which this class then implements the cleaning method for

clean_text()¶

Cleans the user input on the text field, and checks maximum length

Returns

cleaned input

Return type

str

makeReports.forms.cleaners.cleanText(txt)¶

This code removes unnecessary markup from rich text, primarily from malicious purposes such as adding scripts or from copying pasting (e.g. Word adds thousands of lines of markup)

Notes

This code was adapted from the Javascript plugin summernote-cleaner (also part of project)

Parameters

txt (str) – text to be cleaned
